texts.biography: Rhea, known as the Green Sister within the Chroma Covenant, hails from a secluded village in the western reaches of the mighty Erathian Empire. In her humble origins as a peasant, she was intimately acquainted with the secrets of herbs and the nurturing of livestock. When the turbulent Timber Wars erupted, she bravely assumed the forefront of the defense.
texts.name: Rhea
